amendment.description: An amendment numbered 51 printed in Part B of House Report 118-551 to prohibit mask mandates to prevent the spread of COVID-19 on a military installation in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
